mdRecord.dcterms:description: Describes Battle of Chancellorsville: actions before, during and after battle; condition of battlefield; construction of breastworks. Reports deaths of Jackson and Paxton.
There are three files available: a PDF transcription, a plain text transcription, and a PDF which was created from scans of the original document.
